outputs.output_descr: Providing sustainable solutions to training of professionals involved in referal of victims of sexual and gender based violence through development of curricula to sensitise  executive levels of government  and improve their understanding and application of relevant local, UN and EU standards.  In paralel the Project aims to establish capacities of the civil sector to monitor GBV and sexual violence criminal proceedings  as well as to evaluate extent to which the laws and practices in the private sector are harmonized and adhered  in relation  to international standards.

project_descr: Preventing and Combating sexual and gender based Violance in Bosnia and Herzegovina
